verbose_text: Consistent with previous reports, Ub-E1i treatment was selective for UAE, as cullin neddylation was unaffected after 4 h of Ub-E1i treatment but was completely blocked by addition of the NAE inhibitor MLN4924 (TAK-924, which we refer to as N8-E1i) (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG).
evidence: cullin neddylation was unaffected after 4 h of Ub-E1i treatment but was completely blocked by addition of the NAE inhibitor MLN4924
